creator.text: Its maker was {maker}, a relic-smith sworn to {faction}, shaping it to answer a single desperate need.
It was devised by {maker}, a battlefield pragmatist who trusted steel over speeches.
It was fashioned by {maker}, who learned their craft from laughter in leaves and debt in honeyed words.
It was modified by {maker} in a cramped room above a shuttered shop, where discretion was the true currency.
It bears the handiwork of {maker}, who never feared the quiet that follows a heartbeat.
It was completed by {maker} on a roofline in driving rain, counting thunder as if it were scripture.
It was crafted at the insistence of {faction}, under the watch of {maker}, to make mercy easier to carry.
